data.event: Applicants must also reside in town as a property owner by Oct. 1 of the previous year and file an application with the assessor's office between Feb. 1 and May 15.

event.title: an application with the assessor's office between Feb. 1

data.event: Applicants must also reside in town as a property owner by Oct. 1 of the previous year and file an application with the assessor's office between Feb. 1 and May 15.
Proof of income received in the previous year is required.
